content: more pictures are included on the next page cut off a length of green yarn 15 - weave the yarn through one of the stitches of the final round of the body - push the needle straight through to the opposite side of the body and weave the yarn through one of the stitches in the first round - push the needle straight through to the other side of the body and weave the yarn through another stitch in the final round - place the body on a flat surface and push your finger into the top of the body while pulling the yarn tight to create a dip in the top and bottom - tie off the yarn sew the leaf onto the top of a long stem sew the stem with the leaf onto the top of the body sew the cheeks on either side of the eyes sew the remaining two long stems on either side of the body to form arms sew the two short stems on either side of the body to form legs copyright © 2023 icrochetthings 6/6 copyright © 2023 icrochetthings
